بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
السّاعة الّتي أطلق فيها أبو السّمح عقبة بن حلپقه خليفة بن محمّد
الفضالي أيّده اللّه ويتم اللّه خلاصه بمنّه بمنّه وكرمه على خمسة ساعات بقيت
من يوم السّبت لأربع عشرة بقيت من شعبان الجاري في سنة ثمان
وأربعين وثلثمائة وكتب عامر بن يزيد بن مجد اللّهسهادپه پحطه
تذكرة السّاعة الّتي خلّي فيها أبو السّمح عقبة بن
خليفة أيّده اللّه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ăs sāʿaẗu ăllatī ʾuṭliqa fī hā ʾabū ăs samḥi ʿuqbaẗu bnu ḫalīfaẗa bni muḥammad:ini
ăl faḍāliyyu ʾayyada hu ăl lāhu wa yutimmu ăl lāhu ḫalāṣa hu bi ø manni yumna hi hu wa karama karami hi hu ʿalà ḫamsaẗi sāʿāt:in baqiyat
min yawmi ăs sabti li ʾarbaʿa ʿašraẗa baqiyat min šaʿbāna ăl ǧārī fī sanaẗi ṯamān:in
wa ʾarbaʿīna wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗ:in wa kataba ʿāmiru bnu yazīda bni maǧdi ăl lāhi šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi
taḏkiraẗu ăs sāʿaẗi ăllatī ḫulliya fī hā ʾabū ăs samḥi ʿuqbaẗu bnu
ḫalīfaẗa ʾayyada hu ăl lāhu

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Die Stunde, zu der Abū s-Samḥ ʿUqbah ibn Ḫalīfah ibn Muḥammad L’heure à laquelle fut remis en liberté Abū l-Samḥ ʿUqba Ibn Ḫalīfa Ibn Muḥammad The hour in which Abuʾs-Samḥ ʿUqba b. Ḫalîfa b. Muḥammad
al-Faḍālī - \Gott stütze ihn/ und gewähre ihm in seiner Gnade und Huld vollständige Rettung - freigelassen worden ist ... al-Faḍâlî - may God strengthen him, and may God complete his salvation and give him happiness and honour - was discharged (was) when five hours were left al-Fāḍilī, que Dieu le fortifie et parachève son salut, en lui accordant grâce et honneur, était à cinq heures restant
du samedi la quatorzième (nuit) restant du courant (du mois) de šaʿbān de l’année of Saturday, when fourteen (nights) were left of the current Šaʿbân of the year
three hundred and forty eight. And ʿĀmir b. Yazîd b. Maǧd allâh has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. trois cent quarante-huit. Et ʿĀmir ibn Zayd ibn Maǧd Allāh écrivit son témoignage de sa main.
Attestation de l’heure à laquelle fut remis en liberté Abū l-Samḥ ʿUqba Ibn Memorandum respecting the hour in which Abuʾs-Samḥ b.
Ḫalîfa - may God strenghten him - was discharged. Ḫalīfa, que Dieu le fortifie.
